column4: i have installed lame (by apt-get) but is not latest version, how can i get it to latest one?

you have to consider if you really need the latest version.  Because in dapper, you will only have what was available when Dapper was created.  If you have a pressing need for the latest lame then you are going to have to compile it
so i can use the older onesafely?
of course, if it does everything you need it to, then there's no reason to waste time compiling and getting headaches
